Package interfaces

Interface Initialisable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Controller
    public interface Initialisable
    The interface Initialisable is implemented by Controller and defines necessary methods

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static class  Initialisable.ColorScheme
      Fractal's color scheme
      static class  Initialisable.TypeFractal
      Fractal's type
      static class  Initialisable.TypeFunction
      Fractal's function type
